org.xadisk.connector.inbound
Interface FileSystemEventListener

public interface FileSystemEventListener

An interface which must be implemented by the MessageDrivenBean willing to receive file-system events (FileSystemStateChangeEvent) from XADisk.

Since:
1.0

Method Summary
 void onFileSystemEvent(FileSystemStateChangeEvent event)
          This method is called by the JavaEE container when an event, targeted for this MDB, is published by the XADisk instance.
 

Method Detail

onFileSystemEvent

void onFileSystemEvent(FileSystemStateChangeEvent event)
This method is called by the JavaEE container when an event, targeted for this MDB, is published by the XADisk instance.

Parameters:
event - the event object providing details of the event which has taken place.
